headline: Can Ralph Lauren's (RL) Collaboration With TOPA Deepen Its Brand Narrative and Cultural Authenticity?
summary: Earlier this week, Ralph Lauren and Indigenous-led clothing brand TOPA launched the Polo Ralph Lauren x TOPA collection, the fourth collaboration in the Artist in Residence program, blending traditional artistry with Polo’s signature style and supporting Lakota cultural initiatives. This partnership highlights Ralph Lauren’s continued efforts to move from cultural inspiration toward meaningful collaboration, reinforcing the brand’s commitment to authentic representation and community...
